[[Image:Rally - August, 1966.jpg|thumb|Cover]]

'''Rally - August, 1966''' is an issue of the magazine ''[[Rally]]''. The issue includes "Words That Sound like Castles", an essay on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] by [[Jared Lobdell]].

"Words That Sound Like Castles" is also the title Jared Lobdell used for a better known and completely different article one year later, in 1967, when he wrote a review of the second edition of ''The Lord of the Rings'' for "National Review".<ref>[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/Tolkien_Letters_for_sale_at_Tolkienlibrary.php Pieter Collier, Tolkienlibrary.com]</ref>

*Publication: August [[1966]]
*Issue: Vol. 1, No. 3
